text: A Machmoum picture Machmoum manufacturing and sale stand A machmoum () is a small flower bouquet or necklace made of jasmine or fell, specific to Tunisia. It is sold during the summer in the afternoon or in the evening. The men wear it on their ear, the women in their cleavage or carry it by hand. ==References== Category:Jasminum Category:Tunisian culture
title: Machmoum
